text:
# 2012\-02\-29
; 2\-29 wednesday

speak suno

work not to rest, work from rest\. farmers = life, pirates = death if you want to destroy something, just neglect it\. things may be as they are, but what they become depends on you\.

George: Stand up for what you believe in Ritchie: Be a light Tam: Be open to Jesus and recognize God at work Helen: Listen and pay attention Enoch: Stay humble because of God's grace for us Dan: Listen\! Steph: Don't hold back on sharing to certain people because you don't think they deserve it Sam: Daily devotions\!

and wow but I can really see how I delay myself from doing anything these days\. starting this was hard\. I hope it'll become more artsy and soul\-filled and creative in time\. that I'll learn to organize the mess in my head and plot everything down on virtual paper\. I should learn to value my alone time\.

aujourd'hui

just before ACF starts steph pulls me out into the hall with all the leaders and I pray with them\. it was out of the blue and I didn't question it\. if it doesn't happen next week, I'll be disappointed, and for the wrong reasons\. still more social interaction overall\. talking to david is easier, and he lets me drive his car\. I talk with hyo jae more\. she gives me her small stuffed totoro and a drawing she made of one on an index card or something\. I talk with diana more too\. sometimes things seem a little bit better\.

I believe I'm starting to better see the 'now' in everything\. including God's work\. as simple as it seems, a small light bulb still lights up in my head every time I'm able to recognize something He's doing for me right Now\. today in ACF we discuss sacraments and communion\. I finally realize what communion is\. the actual action, at least\. but it's also strange that I have a much harder time keeping my mind focused today than usual because I keep thinking about steph and hyo jae\.

oh I hope I get more organized as time passes\. maybe it's because I have so much to say at once that I haven't said yet that everything's rushing out at once and I can't decide what goes where\.

realize how much I can change by simply smiling\. inside as well as outside\. all this bitterness that came only from within me, and had no outside helper, I just hope to evaporate it all into nothing and catch it all if it rains back down to cast away again\.

just a list of things to start doing now: pray to God\. read the Bible\. write these 750 words\. annotate a poem\.

I initially didn't want to go out to eat after ACF again\. aren't I glad I did? I had already written my name down on the board for "dinner sign\-ups" so I had trapped myself\. I should trapping myself more often to twist me into doing the things I sometimes don't want to do but at other times know I have to do because I actually want to\.

pray for other people\. anybody\.

dive to the bottom of your heart, past the surface of that sea of \_ that's so dirty but that we always end up sailing on every day because we float so easily on top of it\. but if you can hold your breath for long enough you can learn to breathe under that surface and find it in you to carry out something that you've always shied away from\. you find an oyster on the ocean floor but are afraid to open it in front of everyone because you don't know if it contains a pearl or not\. but you create the pearl yourself, you become it\.

I'll pray for somalia and iran and for the people there and the oppression there and for all the other countries and for strangers I meet on omegle and all the ACF leaders and the people I know who aren't ACF leaders and people I walk past praying for each other and people I see praying before taking the first bite of a meal and people I sit next to who are discussing about God and praising Jesus and for all the people on campus who live every day but never really live, who go about every day never smiling inside\.

steph gasps when helen and I mention we've never been to SunO before\. steph emphasizes "deprived\." yes, I've been deprived of a lot\. not going on a depression rant about this though\. just thinking about how never experiencing this my whole life until now means I'll never see anything from their perspective\. childhood\. growing up\. of course you can only ever view life from a single perspective, but there are many parts that are shared, mostly all the 90's fun\. also all the business about being asian\. I've missed out on a lot\. if I care to go out on a journey and discover the new old things, even if a little bit late?

text:
# 2012\-03\-01
03\-01; thursday

steph's mom is a cannibal and she's chasing me through the woods with a pack of kids\. the kids are trying to attack me and I'm trying to bat them away with a backpack or something but I can't because I move too slowly and it's annoying\. I make it to a small circular house surrounded by a high\-tech fence\. I check a map to see how long the woods go on and find it makes a huge circle around the entire bottom half of the city\. but \(mike?\) reassures me that she only patrols the eastern half\. how could steph's mom be a cannibal? I wander around upstairs and do something\. I go back outside to see what up with her now\. she opens her mouth and tons of bees fly out\. I run away but feel a couple under my shirt\. I take it off and shake it\. the bees are gone\. 

steph and sam and I are walking by an uphill street\. we reach an intersection and meet someone and stop to talk for a bit\. we continue\.\. \.\.we're in some big classroom building\. we enter a room lined with chairs and a projector screen up front with a podium with a microphone\. it's empty save for us and perhaps two other unknowns\. I think one of steph's friends who I don't know is also with us\. steph takes off her shirt\. she's completely topless\. I don't react besides staring every few seconds and in the back of my mind wondering why\. I sit next to her and she leans forward and folds her arms across her front\. I think she later puts her shirt back on\.

I get another D on my intro section for psyc2015\. also several emails I find in my spam inbox concerning the class that sam had sent\.

my torrenting caught up with me today\. my network finally became disabled\. strange that it happens two months after it was supposed to\. I hope things go okay\.

sam lets me borrow his gt login\. he tells me his password\.

I end up going to the aquarium with sam and a guy named kevin\. steph isn't there\. I don't like kevin, but have no reason for it\. I hope it stops and I get over it\. sam talks a lot more to kevin than to me while we were there\. what does that say about me?

from unwrittenspokenwords:

Initiative: the ability to assess and initiate things independently; the power or opportunity to act or take charge before others do\. We all take initiative whenever something excites us, something that interests us\. I think what the problem is: maintenance; Maintaining that initiative and drive to keep it going\. We are a generation that has many ideas and many dreams\. We dream big and start big but our problem is, we do not finish big\. I see the spark in some peoples voices when they speak about their dreams\. I see the determination and motivation when they first start out but as the time wears on, those same dreams and goals seem to disappear\.\. The keyword to describe this generation: boredom\. We do not see the finish line, all we see is the opportunity to start; the opportunity to get our feet wet\. We never go far into the deep end and I cannot figure out why\. I have seen so many great ideas start yet never finish\. As time passes, we become lackadaisical with the project at hand\. We are the generation that asks why and how; we look for the faster way of doing things because we believe in “the balance of life\.” We want to do things as fast as possible so that we can move on to the next task\. The funny thing is, if it does not happen as fast as our timeline says it should, we move on without even finishing it\. We lack patience\. We lack the finishing touch\. We really need to see both the starting line and the finish line\.

maintenance then\. motivation that stays\. a bit of force isn't enough because it isn't an object\-in\-motion\-will\-stay\-in\-motion thing we're talking about here\.\.too much friction\. we never go far into the deep end and I cannot figure out why either\. has anyone?

750 words 750 words I just need to surpass the limit and I'll be right back to tell the rest I promise\. so close\. now\.

steph and david\. no more need said\.

over the past year I have convinced myself that she's perfect for me\. I stare at her face and ignore the scratches\. they aren't flaws anymore\. they're parts of her and her imperfections are perfection\. every move she makes speaks to me, her every action holds meaning\. but her actions mean nothing\. I'm seeing phantoms\. when my eyes are opened, and if I don't stubbornly shut them again this time, I'll realize I've been walking through a mist\. laced with hallucinogens\. love drives me crazy\.

# 2012\-03\-03
03\-03; saturday

I still can't understand why it's so hard to start\. 

food for thought: what is faith? what are we going to do regarding steph? are we any different? can we smile? can we walk with a skip in every other step? can we find a content perfection in every imperfection? live and learn\.

let's not waste any money on lego architecture sets\. let's not center our new desire around that\. we went to target last night with sam, steph, david, and mike and nobody bought any legos\. even though we all love legos\. but there are important things\. no one bought a 3ds or ps vita either\. it would be fun, but we have more fun with each other in the time we spend together\. make the moments worth remembering and the words worth sharing\. don't waste money on legos\. they're overpriced\.

she pats my arm a couple times\. I look her in the eyes every time she laughs at something I say\.

I walk into the room and she has her head on his lap\. seven hours later they say a soft, quick good\-night to each other\.

she sleeps peacefully\.

I don't know how likely it is to happen, but if it does? I know there are depths in my heart lined with explosives set to detonate upon hearing the news\. maybe this time a river will wash through newly made crevices\. my face will not twitch\. but I'll be plagued with the lost thoughts of my dreams\. and she'll happily cruise while I drown again in the sea I don't know how to swim in\.

loneliness

but now also with a hint of contentment\. God is with me\. I've felt His presence grow\. I've followed as He guided me\. I'm very grateful that even though I've barely started to chip away at my obliviousness, I still aimed enough attention at Him to realize He's moving me\.

bitterness dries\. consider my roommates: kenny and tam and phammy\. I loved tam and pham and then hated tam and pham and then loved tam and pham again\. I judge kenny a lot and that hasn't changed\. I don't like rooming with him still\. I think of all the ways in which I'm convinced I'm better than him\. even though he's intelligent but he's dirty and doesn't know how to talk and I'm convinced he's one of those living a blind life with no goal or contentment\. every time such a thought skirts my mind I ask myself the about the same regarding me and never come up with an answer\.

but if the puddle shrank, perhaps it'll dry up completely one day\. as long as I let the sun push the clouds out of the way\. and learn to enjoy sunlight, not just rainy days\.

these moments, when I slip\. when I tentatively, temporarily place things in front of God\. make them a higher priority than God\. I can't let them become perpetually temporary\. prithee, God, forgive us\. the best people I know fall so often\. it's an imperfection that's bound hand\-in\-hand with being a human\. brought forth by all the world's temptations and selfish sorrows\. pray just that we can always find within ourselves the rock bottom resolution to try with all our hearts to be loving like you\. pray just that we can always have an always burning, nondepletable faith in You to draw upon\. make us greater than ourselves\. our hearts will be changed\. really, our hearts will actually change\. we will realize the perfect heart is truly impossible for us to fit in our chests\. but we'll love anyway\.

every day\.

doesn't have to be different\. just worth living\. every day we'll find something hidden as we walk to and from class, taking bumpy bus rides, eating food at the student center\. there's no waiting, no lines\. every means of changing what needs to be different lies within us\. it's so simple and kind of beautiful when you first unwrap the discovery\. it is for me\.

talk\.

spring 2012\.

ACF is held in room 185 of the love building\. chick fil\-a almost every day\. she knows I like her, if she hasn't forgotten by now\. I fail as a group member once again\. starbucks almost whenever possible\. sam\. mike\. enoch now too\. small group, room 406 crecine\. dead space 2\. shopping every weekend\. david craft\. late night friday movie nights\. leave \[chime text tone\] in the dust\.

we have an extraordinarily long way to go\. bon voyage\.

text:
# 2012\-03\-04
03\-04; sunday

750 words in 47 minutes\. can I do it?

so I was going to just give up again today because of all the time spent hanging out but here's a chance\.

today kicked off late in the afternoon when david just happened to walk in on me just as I was doing laundry\. ended 5 hours later when I decide to come back here instead of watching kung\-fu panda 2 with him, sam, and steph\. on second thought, maybe I should've stayed\.

if I hadn't bumped into him, today would just have been another dreary dull sunday\. not necessarily miserable\. but maybe only because I wouldn't have known that he was going to hang out with them anyway\.

without including me\. but why should they anyway? there are others we're all close\-ish with that aren't included all the time\. nobody is included all the time\. we just need to make sure that the times we are included in will be remembered\. so don't ever skimp out on anything no matter how bitter we may be feeling\.

skipped church at midtown today because I basically didn't feel like going and I had laundry to do and thought I had psyc2015 homework to do too\.

we the four of us went to mcdonald's where they just wanted to get apple pies but I thought I'd get dinner there until they reacted with surprise and I just went never mind\. and again I waste money \(almost $9\) for 20 chicken nuggets on some seriously unhealthy food\. much of the time these days I just feel like a foul bachelor frog who doesn't know how to do anything with himself\.

and it's still fascinating, the speed with which david became a part of our community\. I'm truly glad, now that I realize it, that no part of me is bitter, that nothing's ever cropped up in me that resented him suddenly appearing\. that felt like he was stealing something from me\. is my heart changing\.\.

as we pass the vending machines kenny glances at us and pretends to stare at the food\. we look in his direction, he doesn't look back\. I smile, I judge\.

ah, I have reading to do for english\.

turn all my attention to only the thing I'm doing right now and then I'll actually do it\.

david and I play portal 2's co\-op mode\. it's my first time playing the mode and glados is very condescending\. I actually felt self\-conscious\.

I lose my earphones today\. I don't know why I don't feel disappointed\. I'll just have to go and splurge more money on another pair of earphones that I'll have to make sure are bass\-heavy\. money again\. recent wastes: $86 on apple in\-ear headphones, $50 itunes card, $75 on sennheiser hd\-280\. but since none of it's my money maybe I haven't really made any serious mistakes yet\. I still want to get legos, but oh God, don't let me pour money and center my heart on materials\. such as $6000 on a car\. that would suck\. I would hate that\.

I wonder how cs3750 will continue from here on out\. the quickchat\. now I also have the oit meeting\. me\. my friends would never have these problems\. they would never have to deal with themselves like this\. perhaps everyone has problems, but everybody seems a whole lot more set than I am\. I feel incompetent and inadequate to go out there\. useless\. weak\. what would I be good for? nothing's happened to me, nothing traumatic to flip over and draw strength from\.

I would very much like to learn how to cook and brew tea and read books and study efficiently and learn how to lead and how to talk and be able to work a job\. some people aren't so awkward on the outside\. but he hides inside a shell and that's when it's safe for everybody to think to themselves about how in\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ and un\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ you really are and how you're really going to need to get shit together to be able to walk anywhere further\. me? I need someone with a hammer to break my shell open\. why not me though?

still

haven't

fully

realized

stupid useless words that get cloned and I don't know how to organize them into what I really want to say\. I want to be able to travel back a year or two and read my news and smile at it, not blush\. point at pictures and cry and smile and not try to cover it up\. but I've always wanted to cover up my drawings and essays\. every time

text:
# 2012\-03\-05
03\-05; monday

just keep swimming

keep calm and carry on

paula kept praying

oh what do I want to do?

today I actually went to the barcelona meet & greet instead of being lazy and antisocial and skipping out\. I sat at the end of the front row and was one of two or three people who weren't talking with anybody \(the others were one girl who was doing work on her laptop and a group partner from a class last semester\)\. still apprehensive about the upcoming summer\. just almost desperately hoping that my introverted\-ness won't end up hindering another once\-in\-a\-lifetime experience\.

she makes a sad face when I leave starbucks to go to class\. that leaves her alone with craft\.

no more complaining, I say\. I'll stop lamenting\. about the way things are or the way things could be now or could have been\. reading marc and angel gets my heart excited and pumped up and ready for something that I had always ended up not doing\. until now\. maybe\. that's up to me\. I know for sure now that the only I have to do today is smile\. everything falls into place when you smile and welcome it all in\.

I want to point my gaze to the stars and moon as I walk and not have to worry about crashing into anything\.

gosh, what goes through my head if it's this difficult to find stuff to write down?

I want to write and I want to take pictures and I want to blog\. I can escape into my head where nothing is taboo and vent steam and cry gloriously to my heart's content and nobody will ever know\.

I don't have to learn how to play a musical instrument\. for now being able to hit the right notes with my vocal chords will be enough\. as long as I can hear myself\.

a work in progress\.

silly how recently it was that I thought life had a finish line to reach\.

buying a thousands\-of\-dollars watch is completely useless if you don't know anything about clockworks and gears and metals and how they all spin to tell time with an accuracy of within 0\.0001 seconds of whatever time it actually is\.

enough with the metaphors\.

so I know now that there really is no end to this race and trying to sprint towards it will just exhaust you and leave you with no energy to look around and no room to breathe deeply and slowly to inhale sweet air\.

my limbs are stiff and tight\. I've forgotten how wonderful it feels to stretch\. I'm starting to extend my reach though\. and unfurl the tight ball my mind's curled up into\.

what would I include on a to\-don't list?

but I've stopped wasting time on tumblr and stopped exhausting happiness on facebook\.

despite all the Now I've gathered into syringes that I am ready to inject myself with I still insist on waiting 11 days until I arrive home to get myself a Bible and a notebook to read\. and write\. it's harder than it looks, isn't it? aha\. putting everything off for later still\.

envision, visualize\. doing the little, arty things I want to take up, it's not as easy as sliding down a rainbow but I'm sure it'll be colorful and it'll bring a rewarding rush\. sometimes things turn out perfectly by themselves\.

how remarkable was today? hanging out is quite a normal occurrence for other people\. for weeks I've gone to bed halfheartedly posing to myself the question, "what did I do today that made it worthwhile?" without ever answering myself because I knew every time the answer was "nothing\." but just writing this brings it a step up from nothing and if I'd like, it'll only go uphill from here\.

a list of things there's no reason to not start doing today:

the Bible\. pore over a chapter and absorb the words into my soul and reflect them in my life the next day, or throughout the same day, and every day after\.

watch people around me without judging\. not an ounce

pour out my heart to the one and only who'll listen\. it's so simple so long as it's wholehearted\.\.an all or nothing thing\. pray to God\.

if however deep down I know I still won't do it in favor of doing something else, or simply skimping\.\.

I don't like obfuscation and will have to make sure not to do it\. how do ones like paradoxical sentiments and kreesha do it? I hope I'll learn\. maybe a notebook will help\. it's so dreamy, light, like a cool misty breeze softly caressing my eyelids\. everything is white and I open my eyes a little bit wider\. I hope I can become like you guys someday\. I mean why not? I'll do it if I want\. I won't become discouraged and I'll learn and I'll achieve this\. of this I'll be sure\.

text:
# 2012\-03\-06
03\-06; tuesday

1738 wondering if I should start time stamping these or else there will be no way to tell\. I figured I would have to start this since small group will be at 7 and I typically end up staying over for 5 hours or longer\.

I really need that notebook\.

and I can't figure out why paradoxical sentiments hasn't answered me\. the nasty blend of real emotions that emerges from virtual conversations online is back, this time with somebody I don't even know and with a conversation that lasted all of two lines\. it's been so long since I last held a conversation online with somebody I want to talk to\.

everything that runs through my mind that I consider putting down always seems so trite and meaningless and sometimes plain stupid and I can never come up with some elaborate, artful way of mysteriously and somehow successfully conveying this mystical blur that's raging through my mind\. maybe not so mystical\.

I'm such a simple person\. there's a purpose for all the bareness and blankness that's present in intentional minimalism but me? I feel like one of the more pointless\-seeming pieces of abstract art, the child of an artist who was simply bored and never really had anything in mind when he declared his blank canvas a work of art\. I'm quiet, but there's no method to my silence, just shyness and social anxiety and the fact that I really have nothing to say about all the things I don't know\. I fear I'll always be the awkward sort of introvert, voice straining to be heard, unsteady unsure posture, shallow eyed, unsophisticated\. if I tell some people this, I'm sure they'd say it's untrue\. but that won't do much good unless I already know it's untrue\.

it's the same things over and over that run through my mind\. I want to make the bubble burst\. look everybody in the eye, say fuck you, and induce so much pressure until it does snap and nothing will matter anymore, I'll be happy and floating in the wind doing what I want and being who I want to be\. clichéd words but how many people here are really who they want to be? that I can't judge\.

I saw a guy and girl in the student center while eating chick fil\-a and couldn't stop judging, couldn't stop looking how the guy was somewhat awkward while the girl just carefreely rambled on whenever she talked and a second stopped by and he seemed awkward too, holding his thumbs up when the first guy asked how he was while they proceeded to have what in my mind was a stupid and meaningless conversation\. I never really admitted to myself that everything I just thought was the same with me, that maybe it wasn't even true for them but still was for me because I know it was for me, with people like lisa and christine, when I used to talk to them, and her of course too\. I go outside and see ritche and say "witchie" and proceed to do the exact same thing I had seen the first guy do\. asking questions like "where are you going" while stupidly smiling in silence\. I had no other words\. I lied about not attending church with him last weekend\.

there I was: lying to someone's face, judging, eating junk food, sitting down\. here I am still believing I'm better than everybody\.

I promise I'll narrow the new life down into little doable bits and deal with them all one by one\.

but I still wait\. for that notebook\.

I'm unpleasantly impressed by the length's I'll go to to stop myself from starting to write\.

at least tim from english class is nice enough to say hi to me when we bump into each other at starbucks again\. he asks me if I've done the english reading\. he goes to get his coffee or whatever he ordered at starbucks and we don't say anything else and start walking in the same direction\.

I could say what the signals she gave off that I'm making up that I'm making myself see were but I think it'd be better if I don't\.

but after small group I could tell I was going to be bored because she and henry and tam were cooking and I was left sitting on the couch doing nothing even though david came in again \(I forgot he was going to stop by\) and also because I couldn't get windows 8 installed on the macbook air and even if it did work I'd just be customizing it all and it would have been a terribly unfulfilling way to spend the evening\. I say nothing in small group again although I did smile a few times and laughed at things enoch said\.

text:
# 2012\-03\-07
03\-07; wednesday

today I bought a sandwich from subway after english class and ate the whole thing\. then I actually worked on combinatorics homework during the hour\-long stretch I have left after eating before my graphics class\. I didn't see mike again today\.

I walk with sam back to ULC even though I keep thinking of going back to my room\. I do go back to my room after stealing a few pieces of pineapple from mike\. it was deliciously sweet, I have to go buy some pineapple soon\.

the ipad 3 announcement today wasn't so exciting\. I'm not getting excited about apple product announcements anymore\. I think that makes me happy\. I'm hoping that it's not the product spec bumps that are getting boring, rather that I just don't hold so much stake in apple products anymore\. ever since blowing those $86 on the pair of unbelievably terrible earphones\. I won't be getting anything apple in a long time, I say\.

I haven't worked out in two weeks, and today since it was a busy hour at the CRC mike decides to switch over to a different workout routine\. we do pull\-ups and dips and push\-ups and the ab bicycle exercise and squats\. full body\. it was nice finally burning some energy, but I don't know how I'm going to make myself keep it up every day until next wednesday\.

maybe dead space crashing every time I reach this particular area is a sign that I should stop playing\.

I was unsurprised when the ACF leaders did their group prayer without me this time\. maybe they pulled a couple other new people into it this time\.

ACF large group today started with something unexpected\. I was in a group with her and helen and ethan and we had to build a freestanding structure with spaghetti sticks and marshmallows\. it was I who suggested that we build a triangular pyramidal base and go up from there\. everyone else built disasters\. our group's was pretty much the only one who had something standing when mike said time was up\. jack's group had built something probably about as tall as ours but it was toppling and jack kicked it\. a couple people suggested I become an ME\.

the speaker's name is phillip today and he talked to us about talent\. his definition of it went something like "a set of skills that are productively applied" I forgot what he said but the word "productive" was a key point in his definition, which is why the terrorists who blew up the world trade center didn't really qualify as having a talent because blowing up buildings is not usually "productive\."

during his entire message all that runs through the back of my mind is my complete lack of talent and how "talent" and "talent shows" always make me think of chinese yo\-yo performances\. I hesitate when diana prompts me to sign up for ACF's "A Coffeehouse Fundraiser" talent show\. tam suggests we dance, but I don't consider his proposal seriously as I doubt he put it forward seriously\.

I get the better of myself this time and skip out on eating at jimmy john's with the rest of the group\. I briefly ponder my true reason for leaving this time as I head toward chick fil\-a again, hoping to make sure it wasn't bitterness at the happiness all the others were having socializing\. to be honest with myself, I'd say that I'm afraid that my social ineptitude would just block me from having another happy night shared with other friends over a meal\. that I'd just be glancing constantly at her and her face\. over and over, getting nowhere, just tearing at the hole in my heart that only gets bigger when she fills it\. I hope I'm not becoming someone who doesn't truly appreciate fellow ACFers' companionship anymore, by not following them out of the love building and into a nice restaurant to eat what typically is the heartiest dinner I have every week\.

I hope the chick fil\-a sandwiches become nasty so I won't be eating their chicken every other freaking day and night, alone, sitting at a table in the empty student center reverberating with lonely empty background noise\. and then walk a dark walk back down to room 110 at sixth street\.

I wish I had a warm comfy cozy routine to go through to get me warm and fuzzy and drowsy and content when I fall asleep\.

I realized that emulating jessie roth and the way she blogs won't lead me to the thing I want because I'd just be trying to create artificial copies of her words, her words that work so well at capturing her emotion\. I have to figure out a way to make it work for me\.

text:
# 2012\-03\-08
03\-08; thursday

today I failed again\. and spend the rest of the afternoon feeling defeated\. I just couldn't stop myself from deliberately holding on to a heavy anchor and drifting away from the others today as I said not a single word as we climbed up the short flight of stairs to where she was waiting with food for her brother up until we parted and headed for class\. in fact I haven't said anything since, not since the class ended \(chick fil\-a does not count\) and I made my typical way to starbucks again\.

read over the lyrics to owl city's "honey and the bee\." read several articles on love on thought catalog\. heart jumped and began revving when I noticed her laugh and I turn to my 4 o'clock and see her and david again, snap my head back around and begin packing up my stuff\. I was going to leave soon anyway, I was sure, to work on my english presentation\. hear her laugh one more time\. turn around again to make sure they're still there; maybe I can walk in front of them and sit down at the seats across from them\. that can be my entrance\. didn't they see me as they walked in? why did they say nothing to me? anyway even once I sit down across from them I'd have to raise my voice and yell words at them to keep a conversation going, something I'd find awkward doing in the loud starbucks and I'd feel failure again right there\.

I stand up and I turn around and they're gone\. I can't see them outside or heading towards the stairs\. they hang on my mind for the next several minutes as I begin slowly walking back, and I begin to honestly question myself about whether I just hallucinated the two of them sitting there\. I'd rather it be that\. but I've never hallucinated before\. I probably didn't\. if I go to hid midweek munchies tonight, I really don't want to ask if they were at starbucks\. they, because surely she will already be in the room with him by the time I get there\.\.

realize that if I were to hang out with her best friends I'd be a laughable failure\. even if it's only for the time being, I just can't do it\.

I lost a little more faith in myself today\.

feeling substanceless\. existence just a cloud of grey\. to exist may be to encompass meaning, but I'm finding very little of that in mine\. and as much as I've read and eagerly told myself about all the wonderful glorious meaning I'm going to create for myself, I still haven't found out how and am wondering if I ever really got up to start\.

"how you know" by talia ralph\.

I think about her as I read every sentence and am disappointed whenever one doesn't apply to her\.

I'm considering turning my phone off and just leaving it off for a few days\. what'll happen?

I also want to delete asta's emails and texts and photos\. don't want those butting in ever either\.

I just watched the 48\-second video I took of a skype video call and know I can't do it\.

I'm also about to ask david if he was at starbucks today\. I simply can't help myself with these things\.

but I didn't\. I'll leave the text there and the next I go to send something to him I'll see it\.

he applied and got a call for an interview less than a week later\. how does that happen?

I still always feel left behind in the dark\.

but even after the recent weeks, especially those after emerge, today feels especially down\.

a day of retreat, hiding, silence\. weight falls back onto me\. I can feel it crushing my heart\. I'm convinced that I can find a key to happiness, that I'll find some way to do without all the people I want right now\. but it isn't happening

I've stopped trying to engage in conversations and interactions that I find empty, resulting in complete emptiness brought on by no interaction at all because I'm refusing everything that's being offered to me because even though I want to try it's always disappointed me every time and I'm beginning to refuse any more bait\.

I can't ask for any of the things I so desperately crave right now that all the people around me seem to have\. what am I missing about myself and about them? this is no wishlist I can hand over to a santa\.

smith

text:
# 2012\-03\-09
03\-09; friday

here I am at their apartment again on a friday afternoon\. I'm anticipating a rough weekend to be preceded by tonight's movie night so I figured I'd get started writing now to meet my 750\-word quota\.

I decided to not exhibit super irresponsible behavior today in cs3750 and asked one of my group members what the plan was for part 3 of our project\. I still haven't read the requirements so I don't know what's going on\. turns out it'll be mostly coding, which would be much easier for me to help out on, even though I know little HTML and javascript and all that stuff so I don't know how much help I'll end up being yet again this time but at least it'll be easier than coming up with bullshit to write\.

I think I'll be able to carry through with my idea well "my idea" for my pecha kucha presentation\. I'll be finding stuff to blabber on about how I dislike the shift towards touch\-based controls\. I'm thinking I'll intro with a little discussion on the iphone's leading all smartphones to become all touchscreen, then mention things about our hands and tactile feedback and how we feel no interaction when sliding our fingers across panes of cold glass\.

there was no enoch lunch party today\. I see hyo jae get sad/mad about it on facebook\. heh\. tons of people like my comments on diana's post on my wall suggesting I make a video for the ACF fundraiser but only because I told them to\. jokingly of course\. and by tons of people I mean ~5\.

I'm feeling a lot better today emotionally than I did yesterday\. not feeling amazing or anything, since yesterday somehow felt so draining that if I didn't feel significantly better today I think something would seriously be wrong\. but today just feels normal\. sitting on the couch halfheartedly pondering what I can actively do to make a day different\.

sam shows us a 9gag post and breaks the silence\.

it's only being punctured with henry's clicking\.

I might be going out later tonight for dinner with some people everybody else knows well but with whom I'm only just acquainted with\. and who I less than halfheartedly socialize with\. I know I should do better, but I can't stop staying still and can't bring myself to move\.

it's a strange weight that I chain myself to\. I don't hate them\. I just don't bother\.

friday nights have yet to disappoint\. though I didn't go shoot hoops with them at around 5 I did go eat a nice hearty pizza dinner with them when mike got off from work and it was nice\. I didn't totally stuff myself with nothing but pizza, I ate some baby carrots to make myself feel better just like everyone else's every other plate was also a salad and in total the seven of us used 26 plates\.

I managed to stay happy the whole way\.

we go back to sam's apartment and take our sweet time making our way to david's place for the third movie night in a row now\. steph plays two rounds of temple run on my phone\. I end up using my dell computer to play the movie again even she brought hers\. I almost feel like I'm standing somewhere close to the center of the party\.

now I'm hurriedly typing up the last of today's 750 while watching the school of rock with mike, david, steph, pham, helen, hyo jae, and jose \(who has his arm around her, shocking\) and God knows how late we'll all stay up this time\.

I'm still not looking forward to this weekend but I do think I'm gonna try to make the most of tonight while it lasts\.\.probably will end up staying for two movies after all\.

and afterwards there'll be nothing left to do but just to plow on through the last week of school before spring break\.

classic rock on the movie\. I have to find out the songs they're using\.

just searching for ways my eyes were opened a little bit more today\. for one, I'm certain I'm suddenly not as judgmental towards helen anymore\. anything else? she's not inflicting as much pain in my heart as she used to\. I don't feel particularly sad or depressed when I look at her\. she's just cute\. this is all just filler\.

buuut I'm taken aback at seeing his arm around hannah\. who knew? now we all know\.

and that's all today\.

","attributes":{"line":{"header":0}}},{"text":"this is the best start to a weekend I've ever had this semester. it started off with a tiny GIGs meeting. it was only four of us today, so it was the most intimate ACF group I've ever been in. despite that though, we didn't have much to say about today's topic, the ten commandments, and what makes laws good or bad.
","attributes":{"line":{"header":0}}},{"text":"
","attributes":{"line":{"header":0}}},{"attributes":{"line":{"header":0}},"text":"from what I gather the others had only watched half of my sassy girl before deciding to switch over to white collar because the movie was simply too long. maybe it's a semi-good thing that I didn't stay too late last night then, because I didn't find the show all that interesting when I watched an episode at sam's a while ago..
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"header":0}},"text":"
"},{"attributes":{"line":{"header":0}},"text":"helen asks if I'd be interested in having lunch and I get foolishly scared for a second before she continues with the question and asks if I'd be interested in having lunch as a GIGs group to which I say of course. we look through a slew of places to eat in scoutmob before simply deciding on mcdonald's -_- so we go to mcdonald's and eat unhealthy crap again but it was good and the most full I've ever been on a saturday.
"},{"text":"
","attributes":{"line":{"header":0}}},{"text":"I'm still not looking forward to finishing my pecha kucha presentation. text:
# 2012\-03\-10
03\-10; saturday

this is the best start to a weekend I've ever had this semester\. it started off with a tiny GIGs meeting\. it was only four of us today, so it was the most intimate ACF group I've ever been in\. despite that though, we didn't have much to say about today's topic, the ten commandments, and what makes laws good or bad\.

from what I gather the others had only watched half of my sassy girl before deciding to switch over to white collar because the movie was simply too long\. maybe it's a semi\-good thing that I didn't stay too late last night then, because I didn't find the show all that interesting when I watched an episode at sam's a while ago\.\.

helen asks if I'd be interested in having lunch and I get foolishly scared for a second before she continues with the question and asks if I'd be interested in having lunch as a GIGs group to which I say of course\. we look through a slew of places to eat in scoutmob before simply deciding on mcdonald's \-\_\- so we go to mcdonald's and eat unhealthy crap again but it was good and the most full I've ever been on a saturday\.

I'm still not looking forward to finishing my pecha kucha presentation\. I think I'm always underestimating in my head how difficult it's going to be speaking for 200 seconds nonstop\. I'm not sure how I'm going to come up with three minutes of original material covering a dislike for touch based control\.

I may try to make myself play through earthbound again\. maybe super mario world and super metroid while I'm at it? no I don't think I'll have that much time\.

spent only a brief moment on the walk back to my room pondering what exactly the facets of me that I'm so dissatisfied with are\. there are just so many things that make up a person that are underdeveloped in me\. so many things a person will have to deal with in life that deep down I know I'm so unready to face\.

all this time and time again, and every day is the same\. was today the same? I wasted so much time today on gizmodo and the like, and further organizing my itunes library, which I'd promised to stop doing\. it's just one of those many places where there will never be any contentment to be found in perfect organization, and it shouldn't be so hard at this point to stop caring and putting so much stake in it\. I'm sure nobody else I know thinks of these things this way\.\.they have it nice, don't they\.

all my perfect movie in my head scenarios pathetically consist of nice cars and high\-end electronics\.

I don't know how well this 750 words thing is working for me\. that don't\-break\-the\-streak thing is keeping me going every day so far, but I'm honestly wondering if I'm being subconsciously lazy and convincing myself without realizing it that the 750 word minimum isn't all that great because it's just making me churn out stuff, and that if I really wanted to write I'd just be writing whatever, not always 750 words of things\.

tomorrow I have to shopping for "groceries" while squeezing in studying for all the material we've covered all semester in UI design\. I'm also starting to think I should have signed up for a monday presentation in english, so I can get it over with sooner\.\.unsure if I would be thinking similarly if I actually had\. but finishing the presenting, leaving behind the nervousness, and not caring about how good or bad people might it is is very appealing right now\.

at least it's not some essay or writing I have to be working on right now\. finishing the psyc lab report early was worth something after all\.

I wish I knew how to cook\. it's just so much better in about every possible way than going out to buy hot pockets and eating a little carton of yogurt every morning\. add to the list of ways I need to revise my lifestyle that I'd really like to start checking off soon\.

what I need is a notebook to write in, a clean desk\.\.some place where there is zero electronic interference\. I'm spending more time thinking about creating the optimal environment and envisioning what I'm going to be like living in it than doing anything else\. how do I do this?

last

text:
# 2012\-03\-11
03\-11; sunday

I stop seeing because I stop looking but then I start wondering where it all went when all I have to do is open my eyes a little wider dilate my pupils and let some more light in\.

once in a while something I had almost forgotten existed finds its way back to me on its own\. it's cute, it's happy, it makes my heart pound for a few moments, like a little lost puppy\. love is a puppy licking your face after you've left it alone all day\.

I love you too, mo, and I'm praying for you too\! ~

I'm in a lighthouse\. there's no sign of life\. the wind is dead\. the water doesn't dare move\. the birds are still\. the insects are still\. the rocks are still\. the only light comes from the stars\. ships stopped passing by long ago in favor of friendlier water\. sometimes you can hear them blowing their horns as they sail by other lighthouses that smile and guide and wave them through\. I'm alone in my dark lighthouse and open a window and let ice snake in and wrap a hard blanket around my face\. I clutch a candle in my hand\. it's the one thing I have that will give me light and warmth\. that can dance and sing to me as I watch contentedly while falling asleep in its arms\. if only it were lit\. but it's not, the candle is cold and hard too and pushes against my palm\. I wish I could hug it but I'm afraid to light matches\. ~

"feeling so weird\. uncomfortable again\. i wish i’d quit picking myself apart trying to make sense of things\. i have a new moment of clarity every day, sometimes every hour, i make incredible sense to myself and then nothing makes any sense at all\. i spend so much time trying to nurture my self\-perception, and i don’t even do it for myself\. i do it for anyone else\. whatever\. sometimes my existence feels like a collection of different stories, and it’s so nice in the mornings and so confusing before bed\. makes me feel vulnerable and tired\. i don’t know\. i don’t know who i am at all some nights, but i know that i want everyone to want me… and i know that i need to travel again, soon\. i need to go\. i need to go like i need to breathe\. need to take the very familiar drive to the airport, need to be on an airplane\. need to take in ten new atmospheres\. i think things will feel better then\."

gotta drink these words until I can feel them flowing to my fingertips\. ~

today I walked past a girl on the way to the dining hall\. she was looking at the ground and lifted her head up slightly and we only made eye contact for an instant before my eyes involuntarily flitted away\. she looked sad\. some people look sad all the time, whether it's because they actually were crying their eyes out in bed the night before or because it's simply the way their neutral face happens to look\. I found myself wondering which side she weighed more heavily on, where she was going, what she was walking back to\. what if she just had her heart broken? she was probably just heading to her room to study for some test before spring break\. either way I wish I had smiled at her\. ~

ritchie and I are late to church today because he had a meeting\. I meet a girl named jane\. she talks to me a little bit\. the speaker is named scott and he speaks about anger and patience\. I naively think that none of it will apply to me before quickly realizing that every word he said very much applied to me\. I had felt a lot of anger and impatience during my freshman year and only began to recognize it at the beginning of sophomore year and am just starting to quell the rough seas now\. bring me that horizon\!

I lift my hands in the air during the ending worship\. ~

I thought I heard her laugh while I was in starbucks\. of course she wasn't there\. I'm hearing things\. I'm still not really sure if I actually saw her and him laughing together the other day because the second time I turned my head around they were nowhere to be seen\. I'll never ask either of them and I'll never know\. ~

text:
# 2012\-03\-12
03\-12; monday

today had its ups\. english class ended 15 minutes early and psyc lab ended two and a half hours early\. sam and I almost didn't know what to do with the extra time\. we walk really slowly back to our rooms\.

today had its downs too\. I'm quite sure the cs3750 midterm destroyed me but I walked out of the room with a strange sense of calm that I rarely feel after a test even if I end up doing well\. I just didn't care about this test and I'm not sure why\. I'm still normally frantically studying for my two other tests this week though and am not looking forward to scrambling to finish the ray tracer project that is reportedly very difficult and I haven't even glanced at it yet\. sam will get another head start on me\. that means he can explain much of it to me\. thanks sam\.

on our way back to west campus we walk past my roommate\. we both look right at him as he passes us\. he obviously deliberately looks in the opposite direction as we walk past each other\. I highly doubt he's genuinely stupid enough to seriously think that I thought he didn't notice us\. fine then\. I'm somewhat amused by the look of incredulity on sam's face when he asks why my roommate ignores me all the time\. I shrug nonchalantly because I honestly felt that, for him at least, I couldn't care less\.

I had to attend OIE's mandatory part ii meeting today\. I walk into the mostly filled student center ballroom feeling really conspicuous standing and walking when everyone else is seated\. The feeling of being alone in such a crowded room was uncomfortably familiar\. it's been a long time since I've last felt its bite\. I try texting a friend about it\. it doesn't help\.

I scoot past two people to sit in the middle of a row and realize that I walked past a guy I barely know through pham\. I recognize him just as I'm about to sit down and awkwardly nod to him and realize that getting up and sitting next to him, even though it would have made for horrifyingly broken small talk, would still probably have been better than sitting by myself\. I sit still by myself\.

apparently my family will get paid some thousands of dollars if I die overseas\.

something popped into my head\.

novelty always wears off\. no that's not the actual thing that came up, and besides google autocompleted the phrase so it's not exactly a new idea\. I do miss driving quite a lot and catch myself daydreaming about racing around in a fancy car all the time\. but I suppose I could own one of the most prestigious cars on this earth and still get tired of it eventually\. it could be a lamborghini or a bentley\. my heart would all but burst from an adrenaline rush if I ever got to pilot one of those\. but then I'd become self conscious watching everybody's heads turn towards me as I'm trying to quietly inch by\. and after a while there'd be nothing so special about the car anyway\. it'll become ordinary and everyday\.

the only high\-end thing I own is a very thin laptop and I feel silly now for being so excited when I first opened the box\. I've had it for a year and it feels so vain, a cold aluminum hollowed\-out shell\.

only a person can be eternally new, right? you can know someone for years and wake up next to her one morning and still feel like you just met her\. she'll never become anything less than the most special little thing in the world and nothing in your dreams could replace her\. because she's all you dream of\. isn't she?

I'd like to stare into someone's eyes instead of at my laptop screen all day\.

I'm afraid I've run out for today but still have 85 words to write in 25 minutes\.

I wish I could cry sometimes\. I don't know if it's because I'm a guy and subconsciously don't want to be seen by myself crying or because my heart isn't soft enough for sad movies to hit or because my life is just too not\-sad\. I have nothing to cry about\. I've never even come close, really, to crying over her\. I wonder how robust my heart really is\. maybe if I never cry over her my heart doesn't truly and wholly want and love her after all\.

text:
# 2021\-02\-27
some of what Dorothy says and does is so stupid that I can’t help wondering if she’s messing with me\. maybe I’m just projecting again, but there’s no other viable alternative that I can conceive of\.

she blamed her “bitch sister” for influencing her to sell her GME for a loss on wednesday after its price suddenly spiked again\. I still can’t understand why she *still* listens to her sister, after all the times she’s bitched about her\. and proceeded to bitch about her to me for the rest of the week, as \[bitch sister\] kept emailing her after she blocked her on messages\.

so she reported to me that she “panic sold” all 320 shares that she’d accumulated for a loss \(albeit a much smaller one than previously unrealized\) only to watch the price run fairly deep into what would have been profitable territory almost immediately after\. then proceeded to buy back in, now at a loss again assuming her position hasn’t changed\.

I’m finally realizing just how compulsively she gambles on trades, and also that she’s likely not as deep in the red as she makes herself sound\. she’s now casually dropped her position in the 35% tax bracket multiple times, leading me to speculate that she’s subtly bragging\. and I hate that she does that to me, that she has me wondering about her, her true circumstances, her true intentions\. I don’t find myself thinking this way about anyone else\.

I still agreed to meet with her for seafood tonight, and I suspect that she’ll just bitch to me some more about her sister, and we’ll repeat the same tired old platitudes about the stock market\. I kind of feel like showing off a little more about asta to her, but I honestly don’t really care about Dorothy’s opinion\.

I met the Ruiying at the office on wednesday and I’m pretty sure I’m the only one who didn’t say hi to her\. she seems to be the type to look for others to lead the interactions\. at lunch, she brought a thick backpack with her, and took out a full\-size spray bottle to sanitize her chair and eating surface, immediately prompting Anthony to shit all over her\. she kind of reminds me of Dorothy’s Natalie\.

{"meta":{"version":1,"small-lines-removed":true,"created":{"platform":"com.bloombuilt.dayone-mac","version":1250}},"contents":[{"attributes":{"line":{"identifier":"101EEE25-66C1-4F01-B957-1BA76DC9EC02","header":1}},"text":"2021-02-28
"},{"text":"I was back at the juicy crab with Dorothy last night, once again amidst the unusually rowdy bunch of people dressed up in eye-catching outfits and designer clothes, blasting music from the same few american sports cars. as I think about it now, it all seems quite empty and embarrassing. and yet I felt secure because I was wearing the new A-COLD-WALL* high top sneakers out for the first time.

Dorothy arrived slightly late again but we got seated at the bar. as expected, she vented and ranted about her sister again, reiterating exactly what she’d already told me throughout the week. practically yelling to me about her stock positions and “little people vs hedge funds” without giving any thought to people around her overhearing. it seems she’s quite upset that she allowed herself to be persuaded to sell her GME shares at a loss. and also forgot that buying back in would trigger a wash sale.

I noticed a couple employees behind the bar looking at some stock chart on one of their phones.

Dorothy disclosed that her account is down $90,000 in the past couple weeks. unsure if she was just looking for solidarity. if she has any gains, she still isn’t mentioning them in any detail.

funnily enough, she noticed my new shoes as we got up to leave, and asked if they’re from gucci. so she did in fact notice the joke-only-known-to-myself text I’d sent, in which I surreptitiously quoted mission impossible 2, mentioning having just bought $800 gucci shoes. 

this morning asta and I called, and I did what little I could to comfort her as she stressed and cried about work and her dad’s employment being in jeopardy.
"}]}
text:
# 2021\-02\-28
I was back at the juicy crab with Dorothy last night, once again amidst the unusually rowdy bunch of people dressed up in eye\-catching outfits and designer clothes, blasting music from the same few american sports cars\. as I think about it now, it all seems quite empty and embarrassing\. and yet I felt secure because I was wearing the new A\-COLD\-WALL\* high top sneakers out for the first time\.

Dorothy arrived slightly late again but we got seated at the bar\. as expected, she vented and ranted about her sister again, reiterating exactly what she’d already told me throughout the week\. practically yelling to me about her stock positions and “little people vs hedge funds” without giving any thought to people around her overhearing\. it seems she’s quite upset that she allowed herself to be persuaded to sell her GME shares at a loss\. and also forgot that buying back in would trigger a wash sale\.

I noticed a couple employees behind the bar looking at some stock chart on one of their phones\.

Dorothy disclosed that her account is down $90,000 in the past couple weeks\. unsure if she was just looking for solidarity\. if she has any gains, she still isn’t mentioning them in any detail\.

funnily enough, she noticed my new shoes as we got up to leave, and asked if they’re from gucci\. so she did in fact notice the joke\-only\-known\-to\-myself text I’d sent, in which I surreptitiously quoted mission impossible 2, mentioning having just bought $800 gucci shoes\. 

this morning asta and I called, and I did what little I could to comfort her as she stressed and cried about work and her dad’s employment being in jeopardy\.
